attributes.action: ensure that ANY dog which even MIGHT be dangerous to humans, even if not a breed included in the Dangerous Dogs Act, should compulsorily be muzzled at all times.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I DO care about animal welfare issues - for instance I have signed all petitions urging the hunting ban to be kept or strengthened - but I feel, strongly, that when it comes to the safety of humans that should supersede any issue of animals' rights.  I would also disagree with the petition arguing for an "innocent until proved guilty" stance; if someone - possibly a child - is killed or injured by a potentially dangerous dog the fact that it had to be considered innocent until proved otherwise will be no consolation to those affected.
